word:
Medical Missionaries and Ministers 
           to Meet Together to Study Bible. 

K. 23 '04 (Dec., 1903):-- 


     A Bible institute should be held in some place where medical missionary workers and ministers may meet together to study the Scriptures. Let the Bible explain its own statements. Accept it just as it reads, without twisting the words to suit human ideas. "What is the chaff to the wheat?"
